Both I and my wife I have been visiting Dr Amarnath for the past five years. He is very kind, understanding and helpful. He even goes out of the way in helping the patients. His diagnosis and treatment has been perfect all these years. I have no hesitation in recommending him to other patients.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Manipal Hospital - Hebbal, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Amarnath K A. We wish you the best of health in the future!
